name: electric-terrain
caption: Electric Terrain

effect.short: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their []{type:electric} moves to 1.5× their power.
effect.full:
For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their []{type:electric} moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes []{move:nature-power} to []{move:thunderbolt}.

flavorText:
The user electrifies the ground for five turns,
powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the
ground no longer fall asleep.
